definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: This method will be called as part of the initialization.
sentences.chinese: 該方法將作爲初始化的一部分被調用。

sentences.english: Reinitializes all subscriptions that have data validation failures.
sentences.chinese: 重新初始化所有存在數據驗證失敗的訂閱。

sentences.english: Are indexes or subscripts properly initialized just prior to the loop?
sentences.chinese: 索引和子腳是否被正確地初始化，在做循環之前？

sentences.english: This list is initialized by the workbench selection.
sentences.chinese: 這一列表是由工作臺選擇初始化的。

sentences.english: Every time you start the simulation, a special initialization mechanism is called.
sentences.chinese: 每次仿真開始時都會調用一個特殊的初始化機制。

sentences.english: The subscription has been marked for reinitialization.
sentences.chinese: 已將訂閱標記爲重新初始化。

sentences.english: The init wrapper is now in place.
sentences.chinese: 現在初始化封裝器安裝在正確的地方了。
數組初始化的格式錯誤。

sentences.english: Here's how we get the init wrapper installed.
sentences.chinese: 下面是我們如何安裝初始化封裝器。

sentences.english: What this does is initializing the provider with the configured settings to a certain extent.
sentences.chinese: 此功能用配置的設置對提供者進行一定程度的初始化。

sentences.english: The final part of the initialization code is the camera setup.
sentences.chinese: 初始化代碼的最後一部分就是攝像機設置。

sentences.english: This error is thrown during the initialization phase of class loading.
sentences.chinese: 這個錯誤在類裝入的初始化階段拋出。

sentences.english: The AP must be in an OOS state for the initialization to be allowed.
sentences.chinese: ap必須處於oos狀態才能允許對其進行初始化。

sentences.english: The first file performs initialization and any setup tasks.
sentences.chinese: 第一個文件執行初始化以及設置任務。

sentences.english: When will the runtime initialize the static fields?
sentences.chinese: 運行庫在何時初始化靜態字段？

definition: a control (e.g. button, text box etc) (computing)
to transfer (for a specific purpose)/to allocate/(computing) to invoke (a command, an application etc)
